headline: Bill Gates Unloaded More Microsoft Shares in Q3. Is It a Buy, Sell, or Hold?
summary: The rapid adoption of artificial intelligence (AI) has been great for Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT).  The stock is up 72% since 2022, but that might have some investors wondering if it's still a good investment.  Co-founder and former CEO Bill Gates has donated billions worth of Microsoft stock to the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, and while the foundation continues to hold a large stake in Microsoft, it has sold shares in each of the last four quarters.
